page.title: 08ANGLICAN CHURCH NANTGLYN.
page.content: St.James'church is important for its religious and social events. An English service is held every Sunday morning,and once a month this is a family service. Occassionally a bilingual service or all Welsh service will be held on St.James' or St.Davids Day.The Sunday School has recently been re-introduced, all the mothers take turns at teaching. Confirmation classes are held for teenagers and the Women's Guild meets every month. All sections of the community are represented at the church and members come from a wide area,so social events are designed where people will get to know each other.A Birthday Tea where seating was arranged according to month of birth,was a popular recent event.Harvest supper and Easter tea are other good occassions.
